name: Amazing Cowboy
description:
Amazing Cowboy is so easy but super fun Runner game.

Jumping, Collecting coins, different Power-ups, in the air and landing safely. The game Amazing Cowboy is so easy but super fun.

You only need to Jump over the object and shoot the Enemies. Collect different Power up like Speed, Gun, and Shield on the run.

Shoot the enemies of cowboy and clear the way.

Features:

- 30 awesome challenges to play
- Exclusive three Power ups
- Quick play mode
- Leader board
- Addictive game play
